name: Escape from Bran Castle
description:
You play as Count Dracula. Pesants are trying to destroy your castle so that the sunlight will kill you. You have to kill 8 pesants to get enough power to force nightime, so you can force nighttime and escape!

Controls Keyboard:

F - Shapeshift

WASD - Move

Space - Dash/Flap wings

Q - Shrink

E - Grow

RMB - Attack/Trigger levers

Control Controller:

Y - Shapeshift

Left stick - Move

A - Dash/Flap wings

LB - Shrink

RB - Grow

X - Attack/Trigger levers
